name: LibreTranslate
description: Translates text using the LibreTranslate API. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

api_key.name: api_key
api_key.info: API Key for the LibreTranslate API (optional).

code.value:
from axiestudio.base.io.text import TextComponent
from axiestudio.io import MessageTextInput, Output, DropdownInput, IntInput
from axiestudio.schema.message import Message
import requests

# Component Create By Fabricando Sua Ideia: https://www.youtube.com/@fabricandosuaideiatutoriais

class LibreTranslateComponent(TextComponent):
    display_name = "LibreTranslate"
    description = "Translates text using the LibreTranslate API."
    icon = "languages"

    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(
            name="input_text",
            display_name="Input Text",
            info="Text to translate.",
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="source_language",
            display_name="Source Language",
            options=["auto", "en", "es", "fr", "de", "it", "pt", "ru", "zh"],
            info="Language of the input text.",
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="target_language",
            display_name="Target Language",
            options=["en", "es", "fr", "de", "it", "pt", "ru", "zh"],
            info="Language to translate the text into.",
        ),
        IntInput(
            name="num_alternatives",
            display_name="Number of Alternatives",
            info="Number of alternative translations to return.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="api_endpoint",
            display_name="API Endpoint",
            info="Endpoint for the LibreTranslate API.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="api_key",
            display_name="API Key",
            info="API Key for the LibreTranslate API (optional).",
            required=False
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Translated Text", name="translated_text", method="translate_text"),
        Output(display_name="Alternative Translations", name="alternative_translations", method="get_alternatives"),
        Output(display_name="Detected Language", name="detected_language", method="get_detected_language"),
    ]

    def translate_text(self) -> Message:
        input_text = self.input_text
        source_language = self.source_language
        target_language = self.target_language
        num_alternatives = self.num_alternatives
        api_endpoint = self.api_endpoint.rstrip('/') + '/translate'  # Ensure the endpoint ends with /translate
        api_key = self.api_key if hasattr(self, 'api_key') else ""

        response = requests.post(
            api_endpoint,
            json={
                "q": input_text,
                "source": source_language,
                "target": target_language,
                "format": "text",
                "alternatives": num_alternatives,
                "api_key": api_key
            },
            headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"}
        )

        response_data = response.json()
        translated_text = response_data.get("translatedText", "")
        self.translated_text = translated_text
        self.alternative_translations = ", ".join(response_data.get("alternatives", []))
        self.detected_language = response_data.get("detectedLanguage", {}).get("language", "")

        return Message(text=translated_text)

    def get_alternatives(self) -> Message:
        return Message(text=self.alternative_translations)

    def get_detected_language(self) -> Message:
        return Message(text=self.detected_language)

from axiestudio.base.io.text import TextComponent
from axiestudio.io import MessageTextInput, Output, DropdownInput, IntInput
from axiestudio.schema.message import Message
import requests

# Component Create By Fabricando Sua Ideia: https://www.youtube.com/@fabricandosuaideiatutoriais

class LibreTranslateComponent(TextComponent):
    display_name = "LibreTranslate"
    description = "Translates text using the LibreTranslate API."
    icon = "languages"

    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(
            name="input_text",
            display_name="Input Text",
            info="Text to translate.",
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="source_language",
            display_name="Source Language",
            options=["auto", "en", "es", "fr", "de", "it", "pt", "ru", "zh"],
            info="Language of the input text.",
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="target_language",
            display_name="Target Language",
            options=["en", "es", "fr", "de", "it", "pt", "ru", "zh"],
            info="Language to translate the text into.",
        ),
        IntInput(
            name="num_alternatives",
            display_name="Number of Alternatives",
            info="Number of alternative translations to return.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="api_endpoint",
            display_name="API Endpoint",
            info="Endpoint for the LibreTranslate API.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="api_key",
            display_name="API Key",
            info="API Key for the LibreTranslate API (optional).",
            required=False
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Translated Text", name="translated_text", method="translate_text"),
        Output(display_name="Alternative Translations", name="alternative_translations", method="get_alternatives"),
        Output(display_name="Detected Language", name="detected_language", method="get_detected_language"),
    ]

    def translate_text(self) -> Message:
        input_text = self.input_text
        source_language = self.source_language
        target_language = self.target_language
        num_alternatives = self.num_alternatives
        api_endpoint = self.api_endpoint.rstrip('/') + '/translate'  # Ensure the endpoint ends with /translate
        api_key = self.api_key if hasattr(self, 'api_key') else ""

        response = requests.post(
            api_endpoint,
            json={
                "q": input_text,
                "source": source_language,
                "target": target_language,
                "format": "text",
                "alternatives": num_alternatives,
                "api_key": api_key
            },
            headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"}
        )

        response_data = response.json()
        translated_text = response_data.get("translatedText", "")
        self.translated_text = translated_text
        self.alternative_translations = ", ".join(response_data.get("alternatives", []))
        self.detected_language = response_data.get("detectedLanguage", {}).get("language", "")

        return Message(text=translated_text)

    def get_alternatives(self) -> Message:
        return Message(text=self.alternative_translations)

    def get_detected_language(self) -> Message:
        return Message(text=self.detected_language)
